title: Some DOJ officials chafe at silence on Mar-a-Lago search
Disney+ is getting more expensive... unless you want ads
description: Disney+ just got more expensive. Unless you're willing to watch ads.

title: Trump invokes Fifth Amendment rights and declines to answer questions from NY attorney general
description: Former President Donald Trump invoked his Fifth Amendment rights and declined to answer questions from the New York attorney general at a scheduled deposition Wednesday.

title: Some DOJ officials chafe at silence on Mar-a-Lago search
description: Some Justice Department officials believe the department should provide a public statement about the unprecedented search of former President Donald Trump's home and club in Florida, a view that so far hasn't changed the silence from the top.

title: Pompeo and Bolton targeted in Iranian assassination plot
description: The US Justice Department announced criminal charges Wednesday against a member of Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps for allegedly trying to orchestrate the assassination of John Bolton, who served in senior national security positions during the Trump and Bush administrations.

title: US teen and mother face charges in abortion-related case that involved obtaining their Facebook messages
description: A Nebraska mother and her 18-year-old daughter are facing multiple charges in a case that involved police obtaining Facebook messages between the two that authorities allege show evidence of an illegal self-managed medication abortion, as well as a plan to hide the remains.

title: Curfew declared in Sierra Leone's capital amid violent anti-government protests
description: Hundreds of protesters took to the streets of Freetown, Sierra Leone on Wednesday, protesting inflation and the rising cost of living in the West African country, according to people that CNN spoke to.

title: Trial in Vanessa Bryant's lawsuit over photos of Kobe's helicopter crash set to begin
description: The trial over Vanessa Bryant's invasion of privacy lawsuit against Los Angeles County officials related to gruesome photos of Kobe Bryant's fatal helicopter crash is set to begin on Wednesday.

title: New image of colliding galaxies previews the fate of the Milky Way
description: A new telescope image showcases two entangled galaxies that will eventually merge into one millions of years from now -- and previews the eventual, similar fate of our own Milky Way galaxy.

title: If you're planning to travel to the US with food items from overseas, read this
description: United States border officials have a message for travelers who bring food items from overseas: Violations will cost you.

title: Gergen on Trump pleading the Fifth: In the end, he will have to come clean
description: Former President Donald Trump invoked his Fifth Amendment rights and declined to answer questions from the New York attorney general during a deposition concerning the Trump Organization. CNN's senior political analyst David Gergen explains why Trump's stance offers him and his allies only temporary protection.

title: Ron DeSantis, unconstrained by constitutional checks, is flexing his power in Florida ahead of 2024 decision
description: When Gov. Ron DeSantis abruptly suspended Tampa's elected prosecutor last week, it was not accomplished in a late-night sacking or buried in a 5 p.m. Friday press release. Rather, DeSantis summoned reporters and cameras for a midday media event, as he does several times a week, stood before officers in uniform and elected allies and matter-of-factly walked through his decision to kneecap a twice-elected Democratic official.

title: Western Europe enters fourth summer heat wave as wildfires return to parched France
description: Thousands of hectares have been destroyed as a new fire rages in the Gironde area of southwestern France, barely two weeks after two major blazes destroyed more than 20,000 hectares of forests in the same region, according to official data.

title: Mindy Kaling isn't bothered by speculation that B.J. Novak is the father of her children
description: Mindy Kaling has never publicly revealed the father of her two children, but she's not troubled by speculation that their other parent is former beau and "The Office" star B.J. Novak, she said in a new interview.

title: Amanda Seyfried opens up about past pressure to appear nude on screen as stars clash over role of intimacy coordinators
description: Amanda Seyfried has described coming under pressure to appear in nude scenes when she was just 19 years old and starting out in show business.

title: Trump's shadow looms over last ditch effort to revive Iran nuclear deal
description: After yet another round of talks on reviving the Iran nuclear deal last week, the country's negotiators are now consulting with the leadership in Tehran on how to proceed. European Union officials say they have presented a "final," take-it-or-leave it text for the US and Iran to consider.

title: See scenes from church's 'Hamilton' rendition that earned cease-and-desist
description: The Tony & Grammy-award winning Broadway show is considering "further action" after learning about the unauthorized performance at a church in Texas.

title: Domino's tried to sell pizza to Italians. It failed
description: Domino's' Italian job was harder than it looked.

title: This airline is restarting flights to Russia
description: As its invasion of Ukraine ticks towards its sixth month, Russia remains isolated from the international community. International brands are still boycotting the country, while airlines and nations are imposing flight bans and sanctions.

title: 'He's just a good kid.' Little Leaguers discuss inspiring display of sportsmanship
description: The pitcher for the Texas East Little League team hung his head, clearly upset after his last pitch hit the 12-year-old Oklahoma batter in the head, knocking off his helmet and leaving him lying in the dirt at home plate.

title: The Croatian ship bringing the superyacht lifestyle closer within reach
description: As yacht designers continue to push the envelope on the over-the-top superyachts that are being snatched up by the uber-rich, several ships in the Adriatic are taking a different tack by bumping up the luxury offerings on older ships at a lower price point.

title: Coke's latest bizarre flavor is here
description: Coca-Cola's latest experimental, limited-time flavor is here. It's called ... wait for it ... Dreamworld. And it tastes like ... dreams?

title: One of Michael Jordan's signature items could go for $5 million at auction
description: A jersey worn by basketball star Michael Jordan during one of the most famous seasons in his NBA career is expected to reach up to $5 million at auction.

title: Beyoncé calls Madonna a 'masterpiece genius' for joining her on 'Break My Soul' remix
description: For lending the iconic melody from "Vogue" to Beyoncé's new "Break My Soul" remix, Madonna (AKA Madge, the Queen of Pop, Madame X, etc.) received a new title -- "masterpiece genius," bestowed upon her by Bey herself.

title: Little League batter hit by pitch consoles opponent
description: Fans watching a Little League baseball game in Waco, Texas, were treated to a true act of sportsmanship after Texas East pitcher Kaiden Shelton lost grip of the ball in the first inning, hitting Oklahoma hitter Isaiah Jarvis in the head and knocking him to the ground. When the batter saw Shelton was visibly upset, he walked over to console him. Shelton and Jarvis join New Day to discuss the heartwarming moment.

title: 8 reasons why you wake up tired, and how to fix it
description: You sleep for seven to eight hours almost every night, only to feel unrested through the morning or even most of the day. How could you be following a golden rule of sleep so right, yet feel so wrong?

title: These documents are 'Rosetta Stone' of FBI's Mar-a-Lago search, Honig says
description: CNN's Elie Honig breaks down what we know and what we don't know surrounding the FBI search at Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago resort in Palm Beach, Florida.

title: Former Sri Lankan President Rajapaksa requests to travel to Thailand
description: Thailand has received a request from former Sri Lankan President Gotabaya Rajapaksa to enter the country, Ministry of Foreign Affairs Spokesperson Tanee Sangrat said in a social media post on Wednesday.

title: How to avoid the most common workout injuries, according to experts
description: Soft tissue injuries are the bane of any physically active person. They are the most common injuries in sport, can be difficult to heal and often reoccur, according to Sports Medicine Australia. Knowing how to help prevent them is key to staying healthy and active.

title: 'Trump has never lied': Supporter protests outside Mar-a-Lago over FBI raid
description: CNN's Randi Kaye speaks with Trump supporters in Palm Beach, Florida, as they're rallying for the former president over the FBI raid of his Mar-a-Lago residence.

title: The world's largest cave castle
description: Predjama is one of the most extraordinary castles in the world, built in the mouth of a cave complex at the end of a valley in southwest Slovenia.

title: The 'post-pop' artist stars are rushing to collect
description: In Dennis Osadebe's "Nigerian Dream," two figures clad in fuscia and mustard yellow stare out of the painting. Their facial features are obscured by a traditional tribal mask and a futuristic space helmet. The piece parodies the 1930 Grant Wood painting "American Gothic," but exchanges a rural farmhouse for a modern home, and a pitchfork for an electric fan -- a staple for beating the heat in Nigeria.

title: Analysis: Trump stokes uproar after Mar-a-Lago search
description: Donald Trump's presidency at times threatened to tear America apart, and the country's democracy, institutions and equilibrium staggered away from his four-year term barely intact.

title: Is inflation finally starting to cool off?
Hear why wildlife is returning to the infamous 'death road'
description: Hundreds of drivers have died trying to navigate Bolivia's "death road" since it opened in 1930. The road was not only disruptive to drivers and passengers, but to wildlife as well. Journalist Stefano Pozzebon explains why biodiversity is now returning to this area.

title: Lewis Hamilton says his 'worst fears came alive' after title race against Max Verstappen
description: Lewis Hamilton says his "worst fears came alive" after his dramatic title race against Max Verstappen at the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix last season.

title: Crypto is making a comeback
description: Is the crypto winter finally over? (And in the scorching heat of summer no less?)

title: Beluga whale rescued from Seine River euthanized in transit, French authorities say
description: A beluga whale which was lifted out of Frances Seine River earlier on Wednesday has died despite the mission to save it, according to local authorities.

title: 4 Muslim men were killed in Albuquerque. Here's what we know about them
Fox boss Lachlan Murdoch privately levels harsh criticism against Trump, sources say
Ancient 'fertility statuettes' discovered in Italian hot springs
description: The village of San Casciano dei Bagni, in Tuscany's lush Sienese countryside, is widely seen as one of Italy's top hot spring destinations, a place where open-air spa lovers and thermal pilgrims have come to float in natural bubbly waters for over two thousand years.

title: Australian landmarks glow pink to honor Olivia Newton-John
description: The Sydney Opera House will turn pink on Wednesday to honor Olivia Newton-John, the singer and "Grease" star who died on Monday in the United States.

title: Gorilla's sliding entrance stuns zoo visitors and goes viral
description: A TikTok video of a sliding gorilla giving a zoo visitor a "butt lift" has gone viral with over 70 million views. CNN's Jeanne Moos talked to the woman who has made the term "Gorilla slide" a "thing."

title: CNN goes to town on fringes of Ukrainian control. See what it is like
description: CNN's Nic Robertson goes to a town in eastern Ukraine that stands in the path of Russia's slow but relentless advance westwards and speaks to the residents who are facing constant shelling.

title: See how Serena Williams became one of the all-time greats
description: Serena Williams has announced she will be retiring from tennis after the 2022 US Open. CNN's Christina MacFarlane looks at her journey from teen sensation to being one of the sport's all-time greats.

title: Russians have begun training on Iranian drones, US believes
description: The US believes Russian officials have begun training on drones in Iran over the last several weeks, the latest sign that Russia intends to purchase the systems as the war in Ukraine continues.

title: Fox boss privately critical of Trump, sources say
